Class TargetPhysics

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.team.game.target.TargetPhysics
public final class TargetPhysics extends Object
Provides utility methods for projectile motion calculations used in the Target game mode.

All methods in this class are static and purely mathematical, offering physics-based formulas for computing projectile speed, height, and hit detection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    isHit(double yPxAtWall, double targetCenterPx, double targetRadiusPx)
    Determines whether a projectile's y-position intersects a circular target.

    requiredSpeed(double g, double angleRad, double x, double y)
    Calculates the initial speed required to hit a target at a given horizontal distance and height, based on launch angle and gravity.

    Computes the vertical position (y) of a projectile at a given horizontal distance (x), based on launch velocity and angle.

  • Method Details

    • requiredSpeed

      public static double requiredSpeed(double g, double angleRad, double x, double y)
      Calculates the initial speed required to hit a target at a given horizontal distance and height, based on launch angle and gravity.
      Parameters:
      g - gravitational acceleration (m/s²)
      angleRad - launch angle in radians
      x - horizontal distance to target (m)
      y - vertical height of target (m)
      Returns:
      the required initial launch speed (m/s)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given angle, x, or y make the target physically unreachable

    • yAtX

      public static double yAtX(double v, double angleRad, double x, double y0, double g)
      Computes the vertical position (y) of a projectile at a given horizontal distance (x), based on launch velocity and angle.
      Parameters:
      v - initial velocity (m/s)
      angleRad - launch angle in radians
      x - horizontal distance (m)
      y0 - starting height (m)
      g - gravitational acceleration (m/s²)
      Returns:
      the vertical position (m) at the given x position

    • isHit

      public static boolean isHit(double yPxAtWall, double targetCenterPx, double targetRadiusPx)
      Determines whether a projectile's y-position intersects a circular target.
      Parameters:
      yPxAtWall - the projectile’s y-coordinate at the wall (in pixels)
      targetCenterPx - the target’s center y-coordinate (in pixels)
      targetRadiusPx - the target’s radius (in pixels)
      Returns:
      true if the projectile hits within the target radius; false otherwise
